bug.short_desc: Mail alert required - open mailbox on receipt of mail

long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 5.1; U; en) Presto/2.7.62 Version/11.01 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.1.9) Gecko/20100722 Eudora/3.0.4
In Eudora 7.1 I had the mail alerts set up to open a mailbox when an email was received. Could we have this feature back please? This was one of the major benefits of using Eudora as with many folders there comes a point where they drop out of the window and it is easy to miss messages; however I could guarantee that once all windows were closed I had NOT missed any messages. This is a feature that vastly enhances my productivity so please can we have it back?
Reproducible: Always
This may need to be added in tandem with Bug 417230 - Multiple windows, WITHIN Eudora main window (support MDI)
